fulltext:
Nguyen Trong Thang
Senior Front End Developer
Date of birth:
 Nov 28, 1993
Gender:  Male
Phone:
 0797 680 657
Email:  thang1164113@gmail.com
Address:
 HCM, Vietnam
Website:  https://www.linkedin.com/in/thang-nguyen-832667148/
OBJECTIVE
I have great passion with Website designing which I have almost 5 years of experiences such as HTML, CSS,
Java script, CMS, C#, Nodejs, PHP, Postgresql , Angular, MongoDB, NestJS. I’m very willing to learn new
things as well as work under pressure to develop my career as website designer because this is my passion. I
have experienced to work with great teams before who have energetic and enthusiastic attitude and inspired
and creative ideas. These are very valuable experiences that I got so that I truly believe that I’m able to be
successful at this field and also I won’t stop trying my best at any time.
EDUCATION
June 2011 - May 2014
Vietnam National University HCMC
Major: Information Technology
GPA: 7.8/10
WORK EXPERIENCE
Fed 2019 - Present
INFINITE SOFTWARE
Senior Full Stack Developer

process of works. Already running in AU
- Using Xamarin to build application for mobile 
- Using MongoDB, NestJS, Node to manage database 
- Git, Jira, Bitbucket, Scrum, English communicate everyday
May 2017 - Feb 2019
Anymind Group
Senior Front End Developer
Main responsibilities:
- Using Angular to build platform about social media, ads and human
resources 
- Using React Native to build application for mobile 
- Using Postgresql to manage database 
- Git, Jira, Bitbucket, Scrum, English communicate everyday

Front End Developer

- Make API by PHP

Front End Developer

unexpected issues happening at work

required
2011-2013
Vietnam National University: Won a scholarship in the second year and
third year

Front End

API, Teamwork, Leader
SKILLS

PROJECTS
WorkBuddy
(2019 - Now)
Customer Australia
Description
Job management software for trades and service businesses
1. Reduce paperwork: Store & access job documents online
2. Real time job tracking: Track, book & dispatch staff and jobs
3. Seamless invoicing: Quote & invoice from any device
4. Teams stay compliant: Track OHS or WHS checklists
Team size
7 (1 PM, 1 Scrum Master, 4 Full Stack, 1 Mobile)

Full Stack

- Development UI
- Development API

- Optimize code
- Bug Fixing

- Git, Bitbucket, Jira.
CastingAsia
(2017 - 2018)
Customer
9 Countries
Description
I. CastingAsia Platform: Influencer marketing platform that drives smart matching,
engaging, influencer relationship management and reporting.
II. CastingAsia Marketplace: Efficient, scalable and trustable performance-based
marketplace that connects micro-influencers to brands that matter.
III. CastingAsia Engagement: Leverage on proven influencer marketing and social
media specialists to optimize your campaigns.

To see or not to see
(2016 - 2017)
Customer France
Description
Lovers of cultural outings, this free application organizes the shows according to
your desires. Ideal to find yourself in all possible outings and find the "good show",
the one that corresponds to your appetite of the moment, the emotions you want to
feel. Because one day you can have a taste for a committed and serious play and
another day for a cheerful musical show.
Team size
4 (1PM, 2 Back-end, 1 Front-end)
